statement: B. Sort the Arraytime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutBeing a programmer, you like arrays a lot. processed.result: You are given an array of $n$ distinct integers. Determine if it is possible to sort the array in increasing order by reversing exactly one segment of the array. If it is possible, output "yes" along with the start and end indices of the segment to be reversed. Otherwise, output "no".

You are given a list of distinct numbers.  Determine if you can sort the list in ascending order by reversing a single section of the list. If so, output "yes" along with the start and end positions of that section. Otherwise, output "no".
